text: "Like a Virgin" is a 1984 dance-pop song from American singer Madonna. The song is from the singer's album of the same name. The song was Madonna's first #1 song in Canada, Australia, the United States and Japan. On the United States Billboard Hot 100, the song was at #1 for six weeks. It also hit the Top 10 elsewhere. "Like a Virgin" has been covered by a number of singers. Alexandra Stan covered the song in the 2010s. Madonna's public character of a sexually shameless and supremely confident woman was widely accepted by younger generations. ==References== Category:Madonna songs Category:1984 songs
title: Like a Virgin (song)
